name: Pucchiemon
description: Bucchiemon is a Fairy Digimon. It armor-digivolved due to the " Digi-Egg of Kindness ". Owning a whimsical personality, it loves to have its head stroked and to share secrets with others, and can be found singing songs when in a good mood. However, it hates having its tail touched, and it will fall into a foul mood and refuse to listen to you if you keep trying. Its power isn't strong, but it has the strange ability to becalm its opponents. Furthermore, Bucchiemon of a green color are known to exist, but their numbers are very low, so their presence is considered to be quite valuable.
